original_title: The Spy Files: The Mystery of the Missing Orb
overview: CREATED FOR JOEL HAVER'S 2022 OSCARS FILM JAM  Deep in the wilds of Louisiana, a secret government convoy is attacked. Its cargo, The Super Orb, is missing. Three villains are detained at the scene. Now, it's up to the United States' most elite team of secret agents to find out which one of these nefarious ne'er-do-wells took the orb... and what they intend to do with it.
title: The Spy Files: The Mystery of the Missing Orb
